English.alert.about: WatchCuts and Cronios automatically run your shortcuts on your iOS devices from your Apple Watch!
English.alert.cronJob.frequency.title: GeoCuts Cron Job Frequency
English.alert.doc.localization:
Displaying English documentation, as WatchCuts help is not yet available in {{language}}.

If you want to help translate WatchCuts, please visit: {{localization url}}.
English.alert.docs.simple:
WatchCuts Help

⌚️⌚️⌚️⌚️⌚️

1. Create a Reminders list called `{{list}}`.

2. Add shortcuts in WatchCuts.

3. Run Cronios in the background (make sure the WatchCuts cron job has been added to Cronios).

4. Check off reminders in `{{list}}` using your iOS device or Apple Watch.

5. Watch your shortcuts run every minute.
English.alert.donate.thankyou.title: Thank You!
English.alert.donate.thankyou: Your support for WatchCuts and independent developers is appreciated!
English.alert.import.cronJob:
Tap OK to import into Cronios.

If Import Active Status is enabled in Cronios Settings, the cron job will run automatically when you enter `Run Continuously` mode in Cronios. Otherwise edit the cron job and tap Enable.

From the Edit screen, you can also adjust the cron schedule expression better suit the frequency of checks, which is currently set to every {{frequency}} minutes.
English.alert.reminders.delete.title: Delete Unused Shortcut Reminders
English.alert.reminders.delete: You will be prompted to delete shortcut reminders that you are no longer using.
English.alert.shortcuts.retrieval: This may take a few moments.
English.alert.shortcuts.retrieval.title: Retrieving Shortcuts
English.error.cronios: Cronios is not installed on this iOS device. Download it from http://cronios.com.
English.error.cronios.title: Cronios Not Installed
English.error.offline: You must be connected to the internet for this feature of WatchCuts to work.
English.error.offline.title: No Network Connection
English.menu.main.cronJob: Add WatchCuts Cron Job to Cronios…
English.prompt.add: Add shortcuts to WatchCuts. Tap Search and Done to filter your shortcuts list.
English.prompt.donate: Enjoying WatchCuts? Consider leaving me a tip!
English.prompt.frequency:
Add or Update the WatchCuts Cron Job in Cronios

How often do you want the WatchCuts cron job to run in Cronios? Check times begin from the top of the minute.
English.prompt.main:
WatchCuts

Pair with Cronios to run shortcuts on your iOS devices from your Apple Watch!
English.prompt.remove: Select the shortcuts you wish to remove from WatchCuts.
English.prompt.remove.confirm: Are you sure you want to remove the selected shortcuts from WatchCuts?
English.prompt.search: Perform a case-sensitive search for shortcuts on this iOS device.
